objectives.en: The aim of the course is to support students' self-directed  learning process, help participants to acknowledge their strengths and limitations, and acquire necessary self-regulation and time management skills.
objectives.et: Toetada õppijate enesejuhitud õppimisprotsessi, aidates osalejatel teadvustada oma isiklikke ressursse ja piiranguid õppimise ning erialase arenguga seotud valdkondades ning arendades nende eneseregulatsiooni ja ajakasutuse oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows how to set goals, motivate themselves and overcome obstacles while achieving the goals;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) seab enesele eesmärke ja motiveerib ennast, et ületada takistusi eesmärkide saavutamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) recognizes internal and external factors influencing the learning process and know how to use them in order to support their studies;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) analüüsib oma vastutust õppimisprotsessis ja erialases arengus;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows their strengths and limitations as a learner and be able to rely on these in the learning process;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) loob võimalusi õppimisprotsessi mõjutavate sisemiste ja väliste teguritega toime tulemiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is aware of their responsibility for their learning and professional development;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) analüüsib oma tugevusi ja piiranguid õppijana ning toetub neile õppimisprotsessis;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) recognises the causes of stress and know methods of stress prevention;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) teab stressi sümptomeid ja stressi ennetamise viise;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to analyse their time management in the learning process.
